mapper.select: SELECT t.team_code, t.team_name FROM team t JOIN member_team tm ON t.team_code = tm.team_code WHERE tm.member_code = #{memberCode} AND t.status = 1
SELECT stadium_code AS stadiumCode, stadium_name AS stadiumName, region, stadium_image AS stadiumImage, description, price, rating FROM stadium WHERE stadium_code = #{stadiumCode} AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT stadium_code AS stadiumCode, stadium_name AS stadiumName, region, stadium_image AS stadiumImage, description, price, rating FROM stadium WHERE is_deleted = 0

SELECT stadium_code AS stadiumCode, stadium_name AS stadiumName, region, stadium_image AS stadiumImage, description, price, rating FROM stadium
is_deleted = 0
AND ( stadium_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR region LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY price ASC
ORDER BY rating DESC
ORDER BY stadium_code DESC
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY

is_deleted = 0
AND ( stadium_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR region LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
